#include <iostream>
#include <string>
//#include <sstream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
  int number=0;
  while(1)
    {
      number++;
  int n,m;
  cin>>n>>m;
  if(n==0&&m==0)
    break;
  string field[n+2];
  field[0]="A";
  while(field[0].length()<m)
    field[0]="A"+field[0];
  field[0]="A"+field[0]+"A";
  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      cin>>field[i];
      while(field[i].length()<m)
	field[i]=field[i]+".";
      field[i]="A"+field[i]+"A";
    }
  field[n+1]="A";
  while(field[n+1].length()<m)
    field[n+1]="A"+field[n+1];
  field[n+1]="A"+field[n+1]+"A";

  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
      for(int j=1;j<=m;j++)
	{
	  if(field[i][j]=='*')
	    continue;
	  field[i][j]='0';
	  for(int toadd=-1;toadd<=1;toadd++)
	    for(int toadd2=-1;toadd2<=1;toadd2++)
	      {
		if(toadd==0&&toadd2==0)
		  continue;
		field[i][j]+=(field[i+toadd][j+toadd2]=='*');
	      }
	}
    }
  /////////////////
  cout<<"Field #"<<number<<":"<<endl;
  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
    cout<<field[i].substr(1,m)<<endl;
    }
  return 0;
}
